Player History
Drafted in 4th round, 66th overall pick, by Syracuse in 1957...
Injured on 6/12/1957 with a Sprained Ankle, out for 6 days...
Injured on 4/30/1962 with a Bruised Hand, out for 2 days...
Drafted in 2nd round, 39th overall pick, by Toledo in 1967...
Had first career hit on 5/1/1971, off Robert Lamere (Min)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/16/1972, off Raymond Satterwhite (Min)...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Pittsburgh on 8/27/1975...
Injured on 5/10/1978 with a Inflamed Groin Muscle, out for one week...
Signed as a free agent by Columbus on 2/15/1983 to a 2-year deal worth $3,000,222 per year...
